"Year group" is based on pupils' dates of birth, not the year they are taught in.
"Compulsory school age" - Pupils in Years 1 (age 5) to 11 (age 11) and reception year pupils born between 1 September and 31 December.
Full time equivalent - The number of full time pupils plus 0.5 per part-time pupil.
